SELECT am.amuse_id, am.a_name, am.a_country, am.a_time, ai.url FROM amusement AS am INNER JOIN aimage AS ai ON am.amuse_id = ai.amuse_id WHERE 1 = 1
and am.a_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
and am.a_country = '대한민국' and am.a_country != '대한민국'
GROUP BY am.amuse_id
ORDER BY am.a_opening DESC ORDER BY am.a_view DESC
ORDER BY am.amuse_id DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{end}

SELECT am.amuse_id, am.a_name, am.a_country, am.a_time, ai.url FROM amusement AS am INNER JOIN aimage AS ai ON am.amuse_id = ai.amuse_id WHERE am.a_country = '대한민국' GROUP BY am.amuse_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4

SELECT am.amuse_id, am.a_name, am.a_country, am.a_time, ai.url FROM amusement AS am INNER JOIN aimage AS ai ON am.amuse_id = ai.amuse_id WHERE am.a_country != '대한민국' GROUP BY am.amuse_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
